front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks -Amendment XX: Forwarding and Queuing Enhancements for Time-Sensitive Streams

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q defines enhancements to the forwarding and queueing functions of a VLAN Bridge to support the transmission of time sensitive data streams.
